MatchedRegions.transcript: So, to fill this gap, we proposed APT36000, the first large scale dataset with high-quality animal pulse initiation from consecutive frames for animal pulse estimation and tracking.

MatchedRegion.Text: To fill this gap, we propose APT-36K, the first large-scale dataset with high-quality animal pose annotations from consecutive frames for animal pose estimation and tracking.

APT-36K dataset contains not only the continuous time information needed for the tracking task, but also a very detailed annotation of the pose keypoints, with a wide range of different animal species.

MatchedRegions.transcript: It contains not only the continuous time information needed for tracking tasks, but also a very detailed initiation of pulse key points with a wide range of different animal species.

MatchedRegion.Text: To fill this gap, we propose APT-36K, the first large-scale dataset with high-quality animal pose annotations from consecutive frames for animal pose estimation and tracking.

APT-36K dataset contains not only the continuous time information needed for the tracking task, but also a very detailed annotation of the pose keypoints, with a wide range of different animal species.
